file_insights.purpose: Record migration details from OpenSpec to Auto-Claude task system

patterns_discovered: Task migration from markdown-based to JSON-structured tracking
Preservation of historical task context during migration
Systematic archival of legacy task files
Detailed migration documentation with verification checklist
gotchas_discovered: Need to map legacy task statuses accurately
Ensuring JSON file validity during migration
Maintaining historical reference while moving to new system
recommendations: Use new `.auto-claude/specs/` for future task tracking
Retain archived OpenSpec files for historical context
Validate JSON files programmatically during migration
Document migration process for future reference
